file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 23-22-01-04 - ACARS UNIT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL ACARS UNIT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH ACARS INSTALLED 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to remove/install the ACARS unit. B. The ACARS (UNILINK) unit is an interface between the FMS and VHF systems. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH 23-22-01-000-801-A ACARS UNIT - REMOVAL ACARS INSTALLED AIRCRAFT WITH 23-22-01-400-801-A ACARS UNIT - INSTALLATION ACARS INSTALLED EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 23-22-01 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-22-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH ACARS INSTALLED 2. ACARS UNIT - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to remove the ACARS unit. (2) The ACARS unit is installed on the right side of the electronic compartment. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200 LG SAFETY PIN - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 214 113CZ Forward electronic compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward electronic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the ACARS circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to it (Location Tip: DC BUS 1/COMM/ACARS). (2) Make sure that the landing gear safety pin is installed ( AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801- A/200). (3) Open the 113CZ access door (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-22-01 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Loosen the mounting tray hold-down knob (2). (2) Slowly pull the unit handle to disconnect the unit and tray connectors and slide the unit away from the tray (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-22-01 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH ACARS ACARS Unit - Removal/Installation Figure 401 B A ZONE 214 DET. A 1. ACARS UNIT 3. MOUNTING TRAY DET. B 2. HOLD-DOWN KNOB 145AMM230159.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-22-01 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-22-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH ACARS INSTALLED 3. ACARS UNIT - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to install the ACARS unit. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - ACARS - FUNCTIONAL TEST WITH A PORTABLE AMM TASK 23-22-00-700-801-A/500 ACARS TEST STATION(PATS) ACARS - FUNCTIONAL TEST WITH AN ACARS AMM TASK 23-22-00-700-802-A/500 GROUND STATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 214 113CZ Forward electronic compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward electronic compartment I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 841-003-A CAUTION: WHEN YOU PUT THE UNIT ON THE MOUNTING TRAY, DO NOT USE FORCE. IF THE CONNECTION IS DIFFICULT, REMOVE THE UNIT AND EXAMINE IT FOR CONNECTOR PINS WHICH ARE BENT OR OUT OF ALIGNMENT. ALSO, VISUALLY EXAMINE THE ALIGNMENT OF THE RECEPTACLE ON THE MOUNTING TRAY. (1) Slide the unit into the mounting tray (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-22-01 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Slide the unit rearward until its connectors are fully engaged with the connectors of the mounting tray (3). (3) If necessary, slightly lift the front of the unit to make sure that the hold-down assembly engages the tray hold-down hooks correctly. (4) Tighten the hold-down knob (2). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 020-003-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, close the ACARS circuit breaker and remove the DO- NOT-CLOSE tag from it (Location Tip: DC BUS 1/COMM/ACARS). (2) Do the ACARS functional test ( AMM TASK 23-22-00-700-801-A/500) or ( AMM TASK 23-22-00-700-802-A/500). (3) Close the 113CZ access door (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-22-01 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
